Narrativa gerada: ConceptMap ConceptMapActivityToOMOP

Mapeamento de (não especificado) para (não especificado)


Grupo 1 Mapeamento de Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC) to OHDSI OMOP CDM Concepts (External Reference)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
55423-8 (Number of steps in 24 hour Measured)is equivalent to40771089 (Number of steps)VERIFIED OMOP mapping for daily steps. - OMOP concept_id: 40771089 - Domain: Measurement - Unit_concept_id: 9529 (count) or unitless - Guidelines: 7,000-10,000 steps/day for health benefits
55411-3 (Exercise duration)maps to wider concept4272025 (Duration of procedure)Maps to general duration concept. - OMOP concept_id: 4272025 - Unit_concept_id: 8550 (minute) - Target: 150-300 min/week moderate or 75-150 min/week vigorous Context should indicate exercise vs general activity.
82290-8 (Frequency of moderate to vigorous aerobic physical activity)maps to wider concept4090484 (Physical activity)Maps to general physical activity concept. - OMOP concept_id: 4090484 - Domain: Observation - Use observation_source_value for intensity context
41981-2 (Calories burned)(not mapped)GAP: Active calories has no OMOP concept. Represents energy expenditure from activity. Unit_concept_id: 8692 (kilocalorie) or 8674 (kilojoule) Critical for weight management research.
55430-3 (Walking distance)(not mapped)GAP: Distance traveled has no OMOP concept. Unit_concept_id: 8582 (meter) or 9314 (kilometer) or 9282 (mile) Context-dependent (walking, running, cycling).

Grupo 2 Mapeamento de https://2rdoc.pt/ig/ios-lifestyle-medicine/CodeSystem/physical-activity-cs to OHDSI OMOP CDM Concepts (External Reference)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
active-minutes(not mapped)Vendor-specific active minutes (zone-based). Apple: Exercise Ring minutes Fitbit: Active Zone Minutes Garmin: Intensity Minutes Not standardized but clinically relevant.
met-minutes(not mapped)Metabolic Equivalent of Task × Duration. Standard measure for physical activity dose. 1 MET = 1 kcal/kg/hour (resting) Target: 500-1000 MET-min/week per guidelines.
sedentary-time(not mapped)Time spent in sedentary activities (<1.5 METs). Target: Reduce prolonged sitting, break every 30-60 min. Independent risk factor for mortality.
floors-climbed(not mapped)Number of floors/flights of stairs climbed. Indicates vertical displacement activity. Typically measured via barometric altimeter.
stand-hours(not mapped)Apple Watch specific: Hours with at least 1 min standing. Target: 12 stand hours/day. Proxy for sedentary behavior interruption.

name: ConceptMapActivityToOMOP
title: Physical Activity to OMOP CDM Mapping
description:
Maps physical activity metrics from wearables to OMOP CDM concepts for federated analytics.

Physical Activity Guidelines (WHO 2020, ACSM):
- 150-300 min/week moderate-intensity OR 75-150 min/week vigorous
- Muscle-strengthening activities 2+ days/week
- Sedentary time should be minimized
- Any amount of activity is better than none

Key Metrics:
- Steps: 7,000-10,000 steps/day associated with health benefits
- Active calories: Energy expenditure from activity
- Exercise minutes: Zone-based activity time
- MET-minutes: Metabolic equivalent of task

Supported Devices:
- Apple Watch, iPhone (Apple HealthKit)
- Fitbit (all models)
- Garmin (Connect IQ)
- Samsung Galaxy Watch
- Google Pixel Watch
purpose: Enable ETL transformation of physical activity data from FHIR to OMOP CDM for population health studies, exercise intervention research, and lifestyle medicine analytics.

element.display: Number of steps in 24 hour Measured

target.comment:
VERIFIED OMOP mapping for daily steps.
- OMOP concept_id: 40771089
- Domain: Measurement
- Unit_concept_id: 9529 (count) or unitless
- Guidelines: 7,000-10,000 steps/day for health benefits

Maps to general duration concept.
- OMOP concept_id: 4272025
- Unit_concept_id: 8550 (minute)
- Target: 150-300 min/week moderate or 75-150 min/week vigorous
Context should indicate exercise vs general activity.

element.display: Frequency of moderate to vigorous aerobic physical activity

target.comment:
Maps to general physical activity concept.
- OMOP concept_id: 4090484
- Domain: Observation
- Use observation_source_value for intensity context

GAP: Active calories has no OMOP concept.
Represents energy expenditure from activity.
Unit_concept_id: 8692 (kilocalorie) or 8674 (kilojoule)
Critical for weight management research.

GAP: Distance traveled has no OMOP concept.
Unit_concept_id: 8582 (meter) or 9314 (kilometer) or 9282 (mile)
Context-dependent (walking, running, cycling).

unmapped.display: No OMOP concept - requires custom vocabulary extension

target.comment:
Vendor-specific active minutes (zone-based).
Apple: Exercise Ring minutes
Fitbit: Active Zone Minutes
Garmin: Intensity Minutes
Not standardized but clinically relevant.

Metabolic Equivalent of Task × Duration.
Standard measure for physical activity dose.
1 MET = 1 kcal/kg/hour (resting)
Target: 500-1000 MET-min/week per guidelines.

Time spent in sedentary activities (<1.5 METs).
Target: Reduce prolonged sitting, break every 30-60 min.
Independent risk factor for mortality.

Number of floors/flights of stairs climbed.
Indicates vertical displacement activity.
Typically measured via barometric altimeter.

Apple Watch specific: Hours with at least 1 min standing.
Target: 12 stand hours/day.
Proxy for sedentary behavior interruption.

unmapped.display: No OMOP concept - wearable metrics not in standard vocabulary
